Additional Scope Comments: GRS 6.1 use will be agency-wide (all email, all accounts).
Legacy Email Scope:
NARA adopted the Capstone approach on 22 January 2013 (transition to gmail); this GRS, however, will also include 2 years of legacy
email from previous platform (Groupwise) back to 2011, as available.
